# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-105">合规性中心中的数据丢失防护 (DLP) 包括许多可供您在 DLP 策略中使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-106">本主题列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-108">此外，关键字和校验和等确凿的证据可用于识别敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-110">敏感信息类型需要以下订阅之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-113">ABA 传送号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-114">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-115">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-116">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-117">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-118">以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-119">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-120">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-121">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-122">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-123">未格式化：以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-124">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-125">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-126">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-127">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-128">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-129">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-149">阿根廷国家标识 (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-151">八个数字，用点分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-151">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-153">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-154">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-155">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-155">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-156">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-157">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-157">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-158">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-159">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-160">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-161">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-162">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-163">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-164">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-166">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-166">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-167">Argentina National Identity number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-167">Argentina National Identity number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-169">标识国家/地区身份卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-169">Identification National Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-170">DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-170">DNI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-171">个人的网络国家注册表</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-171">NIC National Registry of Persons</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-172">Documento Nacional de Identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-172">Documento Nacional de Identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-173">Registro Nacional de las Personas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-173">Registro Nacional de las Personas</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-176">澳大利亚银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-178">具有或不具有银行状态分支号码的6到 twn 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-178">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-179">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-180">帐号是6到10位数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-181">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-182">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-183">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-184">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-185">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-186">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-187">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-188">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-189">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-190">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-191">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-192">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-193">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-194">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-210">澳大利亚商业电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-210">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-211">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-212">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-213">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-214">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-215">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-216">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-218">11个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-219">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-220">11个带可选分隔符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-221">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-222">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-223">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-224">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-225">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-226">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-227">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-228">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-229">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-230">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-231">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-232">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-233">找到 Keywords_australian_business_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-234">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-235">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-245">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-245">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-246">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-246">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-247">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-247">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-248">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-248">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-249">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-249">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-250">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-251">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-252">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-253">9个带分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-254">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-255">九位数带分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-256">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-257">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-258">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-259">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-260">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-261">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-262">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-263">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-264">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-265">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-266">找到 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-267">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-268">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-274">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-274">australia company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-278">澳大利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-279">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-280">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-281">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-282">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-283">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-284">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-285">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-286">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-287">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-288">4到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-289">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-290">9个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-291">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-292">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-293">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-294">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-295">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-296">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-297">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-397">澳大利亚医疗帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-398">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-399">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-400">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-401">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-402">第一个数字在范围2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-403">第九个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-404">第十位数字是问题位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-405">第十位数字 (可选) 是单个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-406">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-407">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-408">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-409">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-410">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-411">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-412">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-415">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-415">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-416">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-416">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-417">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-417">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-418">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-418">bank payments</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-424">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-426">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-428">一个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-429">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-430">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-431">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-432">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-433">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-434">找到 Keyword_passport 或 Keyword_australia_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-468">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-470">8到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-471">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-472">通常显示空格的八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-473">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-474">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-475">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-476">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-477">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-478">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-479">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-480">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-481">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-482">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-483">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-484">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-487">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-487">australian business number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-489">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-489">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-490">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-490">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-491">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-491">service veterans</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-492">withholding tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-492">withholding tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-493">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-493">individual tax return</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-496">奥地利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-497">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-497">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-498">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-499">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-499">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-500">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-501">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-501">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-502">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-503">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-504">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-505">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-506">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-506">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-507">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-507">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-524">奥地利身份卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-524">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-525">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-525">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-526">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-526">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-527">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-527">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-528">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-528">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-529">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-529">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-530">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-530">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-531">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-531">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-532">字母、数字和特殊字符的24个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-532">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-533">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-533">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-534">24个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-534">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="69820-535">22个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-535">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-536">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-536">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-537">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-537">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-538">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-538">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-539">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-539">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-540">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-540">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-541">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-541">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-542">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-542">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-543">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-543">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-544">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-544">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-545">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-545">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-546">
national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-546">national id</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-548">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-548">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-549">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号码 sensitiveinformation 类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-549">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-550">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-550">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-551">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-551">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-552">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-552">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-553">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-553">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-554">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-554">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-555">一个空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-555">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-556">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-556">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-557">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-557">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-558">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-558">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-559">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-559">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-560">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-560">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-561">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-561">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-562">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-562">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-575">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-575">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-576">reisepassnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-576">reisepassnummer</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-583">奥地利社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-583">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-584">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-584">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-585">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-586">以指定格式表示的10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-586">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-587">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-588">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-588">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-589">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-589">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-590">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-590">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-591">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-591">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-592">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-592">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-593">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-593">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-594">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-594">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-595">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-595">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-596">函数 "Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-596">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-597">_or_equivalent "找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-597">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-598">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-598">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-599">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-599">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-600">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-600">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-616">奥地利税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-616">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-617">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-617">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-618">9个数字，带可选连字符和正斜线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-618">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-619">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-619">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-620">9个带可选连字符和正斜线的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-620">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-621">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-621">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-622">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-622">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-623">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-623">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-624">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-624">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-625">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-625">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-626">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-626">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-627">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-627">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-628">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-628">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-629">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-629">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-630">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-630">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-631">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-631">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-632">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-632">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-633">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-633">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-656">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-656">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-657">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-657">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-658">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-658">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-659">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-659">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-660">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-660">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-661">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-661">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-662">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-662">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-663">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-664">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-664">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-665">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-666">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-666">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-667">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-667">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-668">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-668">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-669">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-669">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-670">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-670">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-671">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-671">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-672">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-672">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-673">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-673">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-674">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-674">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-675">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-675">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-676">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-676">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-677">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-678">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-678">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-679">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-680">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-681">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-681">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-682">找到 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-682">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-683">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-683">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-684">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-684">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-685">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-685">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-686">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-686">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-687">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-687">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-688">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-688">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-689">奥地利 vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-689">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-690">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-690">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-691">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-691">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-692">增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-692">value added tax number</span></span>

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-702">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-702">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-703">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-704">字符串 "DocumentDb"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-704">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-705">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-705">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-706">字符串 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-706">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-707">介于3-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-707">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-708">大于符号 ( # A0) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-708">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-709">86小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-709">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-710">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-710">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-711">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-712">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-712">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-713">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-714">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-715">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-715">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-716">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-716">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-731">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-731">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-733">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-733">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="69820-734">com "或" cloudapp "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-734">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="69820-735">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-735">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="69820-736">net "和字符串" Password "或" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-736">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-737">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-737">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-738">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-738">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-739">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-739">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-740">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-740">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-741">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-741">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-742">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-742">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-743">字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-743">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="69820-744">com "，" cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-744">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="69820-745">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-745">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="69820-746">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-746">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-747">介于1-300 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-747">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-748">字符串 "Password"、"password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-748">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-749">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-749">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-750">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-750">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-751">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-751">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-752">一个或多个不是分号的字符 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-752">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-753">分号 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-753">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-754">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-755">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-755">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-756">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-757">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-757">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-758">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-758">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-759">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-759">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-774">Azure IoT 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-774">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-787">字符串 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-787">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-788">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-788">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-789">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-789">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-790">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-790">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-791">43小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-791">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-792">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-792">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-795">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-795">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-796">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-796">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-797">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-797">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-798">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-798">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-813">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-813">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-814">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-815">字符串 "userpwd ="，后跟一个字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-815">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-816">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-816">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-817">字符串 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-817">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-818">任何60小写字母或数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-818">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-819">引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-819">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-820">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-820">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-821">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-821">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-822">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-822">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-823">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-823">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-824">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-824">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-825">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-825">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-840">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-840">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-841">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-841">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-842">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-842">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="69820-843">net "，后跟下面的模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-843">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-844">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-844">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-845">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-845">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="69820-846">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-846">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-847">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-847">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-848">字符串 "password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-848">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-849">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-849">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-850">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-850">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-851">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-851">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-852">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-852">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-853">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-853">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-854">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-854">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-855">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-855">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-856">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-856">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-857">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-857">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-858">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-858">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-859">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-859">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
