## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1735">加拿大社会保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1735">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1736">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1736">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1737">9个数字，带可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1737">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1738">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1738">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1739">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1739">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1740">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1740">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1741">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1741">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1742">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1742">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1743">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1743">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1744">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1744">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1745">未格式化：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1745">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1746">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1746">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1747">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1747">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1748">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1748">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1749">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1749">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1750">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1750">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1751">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1751">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-1752">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1752">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-1753">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1753">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-1754">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1754">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1755">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1755">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1756">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1757">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1757">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1758">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1758">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1759">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1759">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_sin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1775">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1775">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1776">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1776">driver's license</span></span>

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1784">智利标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1784">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1785">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1786">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个校验位或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1786">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1787">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1788">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1788">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1789">一到两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1789">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1790">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1790">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1791">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1791">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1792">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1792">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1793">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1793">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1794">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1794">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1795">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 这是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1795">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1796">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1796">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1797">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1797">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1798">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1798">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1799">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1799">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1800">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1800">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1801">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1801">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1802">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1802">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1804">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1804">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1805">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1805">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1820">中国居民身份卡片 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1820">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1821">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1821">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1822">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1822">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1823">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1823">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1824">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1824">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1825">6个数字，这是一个地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1825">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1826">8位数，形式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1826">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1827">三个数字，这是一个订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1827">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1828">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1828">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1829">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1829">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1830">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1830">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1831">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1831">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1832">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1832">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1833">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1833">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1834">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1834">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1835">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1835">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1836">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1836">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1837">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1837">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1838">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1838">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1851">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1851">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1852">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1853">14到16个数字，可以设置格式或无格式 (dddddddddddddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1853">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1854">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1855">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1855">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1856">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1857">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1857">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-1858">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1859">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1859">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1860">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1860">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1861">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1861">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-1862">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1862">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-1863">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1863">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-1864">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1864">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1865">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1865">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-1866">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1866">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1867">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1867">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-1868">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-1868">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2128">克罗地亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2128">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2129">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2129">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2130">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2130">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2131">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2131">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2132">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2132">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2133">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2133">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2134">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2134">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2135">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2135">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2136">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2136">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2137">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2137">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2138">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2138">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2139">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2139">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2155">克罗地亚 identity 卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2155">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2156">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2156">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2157">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2157">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2158">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2158">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2159">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2159">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2160">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2160">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2161">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2161">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2162">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2162">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2163">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2163">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2164">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2165">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2165">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2166">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2166">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2197">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2197">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2198">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2198">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2199">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2199">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2200">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2200">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2201">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2201">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2202">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2202">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2203">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2204">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2204">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2205">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2206">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2206">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2207">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2207">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2208">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2208">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2209">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2209">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2210">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2210">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2211">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2211">passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2212">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2212">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2213">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2213">passportid</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2226">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2226">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2228">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2228">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2229">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2230">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2230">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2231">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2231">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2232">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2232">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2233">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2234">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2234">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2235">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2236">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2236">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2237">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2237">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2238">找到 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2238">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2239">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2239">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2240">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2240">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2241">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2241">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2242">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2273">克罗地亚社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2273">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2274">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2274">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2275">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2276">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2276">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2277">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2278">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2278">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2279">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2279">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2280">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2280">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2281">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2282">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2282">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2283">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2284">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2284">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2285">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2285">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2286">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2286">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2287">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2287">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2288">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2288">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2305">塞浦路斯驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2305">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2306">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2306">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2307">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2307">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2308">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2308">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2309">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2309">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2310">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2310">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2311">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2312">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2312">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2313">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2314">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2314">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2315">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2315">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2316">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2316">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2317">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2317">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2322">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2322">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2323">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2323">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2324">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2324">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2331">塞浦路斯标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2331">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2332">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2332">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2333">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2333">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2334">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2334">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2335">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2335">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2336">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2336">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2337">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2337">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2338">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2338">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2339">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2339">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2340">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2340">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2341">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2341">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2342">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2342">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2343">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2343">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2344">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2344">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2345">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2345">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2346">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2346">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2347">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2347">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2349">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2349">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2350">id 卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2350">id card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2352">kimlik karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2352">kimlik karti</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2356">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2356">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2357">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2357">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2358">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2358">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2359">一个字母后跟6-8 个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2359">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2360">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2360">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2361">一个字母后跟6到8个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2361">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2362">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2363">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2363">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2364">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2365">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2366">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2366">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2367">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2367">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2393">塞浦路斯税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2393">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2394">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2394">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2395">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2395">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2396">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2396">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2397">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2397">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2398">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2398">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2399">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2399">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2400">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2400">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2401">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2401">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2402">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2402">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2403">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2403">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2404">"0" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2404">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2405">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2405">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2406">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2406">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2407">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2407">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2408">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2408">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2409">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2409">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2410">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2410">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2411">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2411">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2412">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2412">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2413">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2413">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2414">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2414">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2437">vergi kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2437">vergi kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2438">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2438">αριθμός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2439">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2439">κωδικός φορολογικού μητρώου</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2440">φορολογική ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2440">φορολογική ταυτότητα</span></span>

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2442">捷克语驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2442">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2443">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2443">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2445">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2445">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2446">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2447">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2447">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2448">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2448">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2449">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2449">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2450">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2450">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2451">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2451">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2452">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2452">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2453">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2453">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2454">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2454">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2455">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2455">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2456">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2456">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2473">捷克语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2473">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2474">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2474">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2476">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2476">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2478">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2478">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2480">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2480">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2482">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2483">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2483">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2484">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2484">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2503">捷克个人识别码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2503">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2504">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2504">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2505">9个数字，带可选的正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，可选的正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2505">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2506">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2506">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2507"> (旧格式) 的9个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2507">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2508">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2508">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2509">可选的正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2509">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2510">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2510">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2511">10个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2511">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2512">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2512">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2513">可选的正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2513">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2514">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2514">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2515">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2515">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2516">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2516">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2517">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2517">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2518">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2518">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2519">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2519">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2520">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2520">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2521">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2521">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2522">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2523">函数 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2523">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2524">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2524">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2571">捷克社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2571">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2572">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2572">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2573">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2573">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2574">指定模式中的10个数字和一个反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2574">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2575">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2575">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2576">10个数字和一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2576">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2577">与出生日期对应的6个数字 (YYMMDD) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2577">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2578">反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2578">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2579">与一个序列号相对应的三个数字，用于分隔出生于同一日期的人员</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2579">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2580">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2580">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2581">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2581">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2582">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2582">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2583">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2583">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2584">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2584">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2585">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2585">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2586">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2586">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2587">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2588">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2588">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2604">丹麦驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2604">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2605">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2605">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2606">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2606">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2607">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2607">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2608">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2608">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2609">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2609">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2610">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2610">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2611">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2611">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2612">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2612">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2613">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2613">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2614">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2614">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2615">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2615">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2632">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2632">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2633">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2633">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2634">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2634">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2635">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2635">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2636">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2636">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2637">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2637">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2638">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2638">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2639">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2639">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2640">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2640">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2641">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2641">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2642">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2642">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2643">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2643">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2660">丹麦个人身份号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2660">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2662">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2662">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2663">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2664">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2664">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2665">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2665">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2666">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2666">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2667">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2667">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2668">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2669">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2670">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2671">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2672">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2672">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2673">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2673">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2674">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2674">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2675">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2675">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2676">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2676">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2677">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2677">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2749">丹麦社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2749">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2750">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2750">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2752">指定模式中的10个数字和一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2752">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2753">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2754">10个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2754">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2755">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2755">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2756">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2756">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2757">与序列号对应的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2757">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2758">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2759">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2759">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-2760">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-2761">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2761">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2762">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2762">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2763">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2763">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-2764">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2765">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2765">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-2777">cpr-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-2777">cpr-nummer</span></span>
