## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-3993">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-3993">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-3994">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-3994">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-3995">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-3995">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-3996">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-3996">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-3997">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-3997">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-3998">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-3998">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-3999">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-3999">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4000">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4000">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4001">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4001">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4002">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4002">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4003">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4003">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4004">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4004">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4005">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4005">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4006">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4006">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4007">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4007">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4008">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4008">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4009">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4009">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4010">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4010">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4011">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4011">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4012">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4012">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4013">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4013">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4039">德国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4039">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4040">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4040">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4041">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4041">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4042">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4042">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4043">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4043">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4044">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4044">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4045">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4045">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4046">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4046">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4047">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4047">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4048">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4048">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4049">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4049">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4050">字母 D 或 D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4050">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4051">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4051">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4052">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4052">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4053">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4053">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4054">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4054">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4055">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4055">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4056">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4056">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4057">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4057">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4058">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4059">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4059">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4060">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4061">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4062">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4062">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4063">找到 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4063">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4064">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4065">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4065">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4066">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4066">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4067">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4067">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4068">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4068">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4069">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4069">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4070">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4070">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4071">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4071">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4072">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4072">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4073">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4073">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4074">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4074">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4075">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4075">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4076">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4076">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4078">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4078">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4079">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4080">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4080">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4081">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4082">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4082">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4083">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4084">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4084">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4085">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4085">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4086">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4086">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4103">希腊国家 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4103">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4104">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4104">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4105">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4105">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4106">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4106">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4107">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4107">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4108">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4108">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4109">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4109">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4110">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4110">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4111">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4111">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4112">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4112">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4113">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4113">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4114">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4114">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4115">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4115">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4116">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4116">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4117">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4117">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4118">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4118">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4119">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4119">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4120">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4120">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4121">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4121">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4122">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4122">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4133">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4133">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4134">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4134">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4135">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4136">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4136">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4137">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4137">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4138">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4138">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4139">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4140">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4140">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4141">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4142">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4142">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4143">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4143">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4144">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4144">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4161">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4161">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4162">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4162">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4163">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4163">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4164">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4164">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4165">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4165">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4166">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4166">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4167">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4167">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4168">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4169">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4169">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4170">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4171">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4171">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4173">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4173">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4176">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4176">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4177">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4177">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4206">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4206">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4207">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4207">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4208">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4208">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4209">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4209">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4210">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4210">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4211">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4211">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4212">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4212">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4213">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4213">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4214">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4215">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4216">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4217">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4217">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4218">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4218">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4219">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4219">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4220">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4221">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4221">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4222">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4222">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4223">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4263">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4263">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4264">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4264">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4265">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4265">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4266">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4266">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4267">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4267">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4268">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4268">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4269">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4269">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4270">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4270">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4271">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4272">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4272">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4273">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4274">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4274">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4275">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4275">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4276">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4276">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4292">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4292">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4293">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4293">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4294">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4294">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4295">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4295">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4296">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4296">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4297">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4297">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4298">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4298">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4299">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4299">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4300">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4300">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4301">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4301">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4302">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4302">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4303">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4303">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4304">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4304">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4305">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4305">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4306">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4306">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4307">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4307">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4308">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4308">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4309">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4309">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4310">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4310">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4311">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4311">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4312">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4312">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4313">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4313">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4314">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4314">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4325">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4325">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4326">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4326">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4328">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4328">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4329">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4330">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4330">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4331">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4331">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4332">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4332">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4333">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4333">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4334">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4334">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4335">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4335">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4336">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4336">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4353">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4353">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4354">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4355">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4356">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4356">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4357">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4358">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4358">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4359">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4360">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4360">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4361">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4362">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4362">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4363">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4363">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4364">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4364">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4365">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4366">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4366">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4386">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4386">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4387">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4387">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4388">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4388">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4389">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4389">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4390">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4390">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4391">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4391">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4392">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4392">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4393">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4393">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4394">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4394">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4395">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4395">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4396">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4396">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4397">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4397">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4398">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4398">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4399">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4399">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4400">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4400">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4401">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4401">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4402">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4402">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4403">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4403">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4404">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4404">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4405">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4405">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4406">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4406">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4407">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4407">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4433">匈牙利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4433">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4434">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4434">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4435">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4435">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4436">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4436">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4437">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4437">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4438">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4438">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4439">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4439">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4440">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4440">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4441">10个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4441">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4442">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4442">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4443">10个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4443">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4444">2个字母-HU 或 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4444">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4445">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4445">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4446">8位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4446">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4447">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4448">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4448">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4449">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4450">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4450">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4451">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4451">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4452">找到 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4452">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4453">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4453">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4454">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4454">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4460">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4460">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4461">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4461">hungarianvatno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4466">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4466">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4467">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4467">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4468"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4468">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4470">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4470">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4471">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4472">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4472">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4473">五个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4473">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4474">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4474">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4475">一个字母，是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4475">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4476">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4476">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4477">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4477">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4478">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4478">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4479">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4479">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4480">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4480">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4481">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4481">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4482">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4482">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4483">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4483">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4484">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4484">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4485">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4485">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4486">蛋糕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4486">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4487">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4487">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4488">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4489">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4489">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4490">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4491">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4491">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4492">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4492">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4493">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4493">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4494">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4494">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4495">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4495">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4496">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4496">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4497">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4498">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4498">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4499">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4500">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4500">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4501">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4501">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4502">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4502">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4503">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4503">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4504">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4504">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4505">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4505">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4506">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4506">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4507">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4507">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4508">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4508">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4509">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4509">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4510">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4510">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4511">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4511">UID</span></span>

## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4513">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4513">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4515">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4515">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4516">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4517">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4517">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4518">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4518">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4519">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4519">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4520">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4520">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4521">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4521">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4522">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4522">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4523">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4523">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4524">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4524">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4525">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4525">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4526">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4526">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4527">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4527">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4528">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4528">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4529">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4529">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4530">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4530">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4531">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4531">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4532">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4532">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4533">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4533">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4534">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4534">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4535">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4535">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4536">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4536">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4537"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4537">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4539">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4539">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4540">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4541">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4541">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4542">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4542">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4543">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4543">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4544">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4544">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4545">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4545">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-p133">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-p133">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4548">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4549">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4549">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4550">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4550">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4551">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4551">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4552">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4552">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4553">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4553">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4554">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4554">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4555">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4555">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4556">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4556">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4557">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4557">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4558">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4559">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4559">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4560">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4561">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4561">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4562">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4562">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4563">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4563">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4564">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4564">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4565">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4565">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4566">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4566">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4567">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4567">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4568">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4569">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4569">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4570">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4570">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4571">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4571">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-4572">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4572">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4573">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4573">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-4574">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4574">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4575">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4575">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4576">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4576">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4577">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4577">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4578">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4578">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4579">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4579">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4580">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4581">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4581">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4582">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4582">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4583">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4583">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4584">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4584">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4585">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4585">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4586">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4586">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4587">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4587">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4588">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4588">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4589">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4589">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-4590">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4590">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4591">Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4591">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-4592">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4592">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4593">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4593">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4594">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4594">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4595">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4595">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4596">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4596">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4597">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4597">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4598"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4598">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4599">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4599">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4600">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4600">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4601">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4601">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4602">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4602">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4603">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4603">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4604">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4604">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4605">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4605">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4606">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4606">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4607">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4607">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4608">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4608">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4609">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4609">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4610">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4610">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4611">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4611">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
