## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4619">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4619">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4620">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4620">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4621">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4621">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4622">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4622">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4623">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4623">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4624">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4624">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4625">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4625">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4626">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4626">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4627">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4627">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4628">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4628">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4629">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4629">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4630">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4631">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4631">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4632">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4632">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4639">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4639">drivers lic.</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4648">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4648">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4649">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4649">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4650">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4650">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4651">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4651">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4652">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4652">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4653">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4653">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4654">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4654">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4655">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4655">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4656">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4656">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4657">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4657">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4658">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4658">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4659">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4659">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4660">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4660">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4661">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4661">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4682">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4682">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4684">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4684">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4685">七位数字后跟1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4685">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4686">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4686">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4687">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4687">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4688">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4689">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4689">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4690">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4690">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4691">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4691">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4692">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4692">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4693">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4693">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4694">字母 (区分大小写) 这是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4694">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4695">一个-I 范围内的可选字母，或 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4695">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4696">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4697">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4697">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4698">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4699">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4699">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4700">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4700">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4701">找到 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4701">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4702">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4702">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4703">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4703">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4704">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4704">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4705">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4705">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4750">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4750">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4751">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4751">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4752">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4752">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4753">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4753">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4754">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4754">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4755">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4755">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4756">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4756">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4757">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4757">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4758">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4758">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4759">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4759">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4760">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4760">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4761">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4761">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4762">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4763">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4763">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4764">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4765">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4765">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4766">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4766">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4767">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4767">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4768">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4768">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4769">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4770">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4770">Bank Account Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4772">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4772">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4773">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4774">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4774">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4775">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4776">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4776">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4777">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4778">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4778">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4779">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4779">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4780">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4780">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4781">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4781">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4782">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4782">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4783">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4783">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4784">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4784">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4785">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4785">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4786">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4786">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4787">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4788">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4788">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4789">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4789">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4790">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4790">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4791">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4791">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4792">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4792">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4793">10个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4793">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4794">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4794">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4795">10个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4795">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4796">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4796">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4797">字母 "A" 或 "V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4797">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4798">七个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字或下划线字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4798">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4799">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4799">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4800">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4800">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4801">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4801">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4802">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4802">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4803">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4803">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4804">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4804">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4805">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4805">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4806">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4806">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4807">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4808">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4808">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4809">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4809">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4810">意大利会计代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4810">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4811">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4811">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4812">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4812">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4813">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4813">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4814">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4814">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4815">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4815">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4816">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4816">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4817">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4818">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4818">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4819">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4820">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4820">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4821">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4821">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4822">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4822">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4823">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4823">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4824">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4824">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4825">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4825">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4826">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4826">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4827">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4827">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4828">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4828">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4829">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4829">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4830">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4830">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4831">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4831">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4832">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4832">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4833">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4833">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4834">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4834">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4835">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4835">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4870">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4870">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4871">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4871">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4872">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4872">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4873">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4873">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4874">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4874">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4875">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4875">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4876">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4876">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4877">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4877">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4878">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4878">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4879">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4879">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4880">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4880">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4881">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4881">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4882">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4882">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4883">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4883">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4904">意大利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4904">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-4905">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4905">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4906">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4906">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4907">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4907">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4908">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4908">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4909">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4909">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4910">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4910">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4911">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4912">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4912">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4913">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4914">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4914">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4915">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4915">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4916">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4916">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4917">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4917">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4918">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4918">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4919">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4919">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4920">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4920">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4921">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4921">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4922">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4922">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4923">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4923">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4924">找到 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4924">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4925">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4925">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4926">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4926">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4927">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4927">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4928">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4928">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4934">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4934">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4935">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4935">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4936">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4936">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4937">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4937">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4938">银行帐户号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4938">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4939">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4939">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4940">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4940">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4941">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4941">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4942">可选) 的空格或短划线 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4942">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4943">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4943">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4945">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-4946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4947">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4947">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4948">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4948">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4949">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4949">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4950">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4950">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4951">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4951">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4952">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4952">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-4953">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4953">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4954">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4954">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-4955">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-4955">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5014">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5014">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5016">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5016">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5017">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5018">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5018">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5019">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5020">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5020">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5021">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5022">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5022">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5023">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5023">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5024">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5024">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5052">日本我的号码-公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5052">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5053">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5053">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5054">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5054">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5055">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5055">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5056">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5056">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5057">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5057">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5058">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5058">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5059">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5060">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5060">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5061">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5062">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5062">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5063">一位数从1到9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5063">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5064">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5064">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5065">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5065">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5066">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5066">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5067">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5067">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5068">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5068">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5069">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5069">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5070">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5070">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5071">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5071">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5072">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5072">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5085">日本我的号码-个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5085">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5086">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5086">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5087">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5087">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5088">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5088">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5089">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5089">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5090">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5090">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5091">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5091">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5092">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5093">12位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5093">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5094">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5094">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5095">12位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5095">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5096">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5096">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5097">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5097">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5098">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5098">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5099">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5099">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5100">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5100">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5101">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5102">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5103">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5104">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5104">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5105">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5105">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5106">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5106">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5107">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5107">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5108">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5108">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5121">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5121">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5122">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5122">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5123">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5123">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5124">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5124">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5125">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5125">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5126">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5127">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5127">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5128">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5129">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5130">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5130">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5131">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5131">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5132">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5132">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5133">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5133">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5135">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5135">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5136">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5136">パスポートのNum</span></span>

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5138">日本住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5138">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5139">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5140">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5140">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5141">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5142">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5142">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5143">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5143">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5144">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5144">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5145">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5145">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5146">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5147">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5147">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5148">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5149">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5149">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5150">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5150">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5151">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5151">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5152">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5152">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5153">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5153">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5154">住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5154">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5155">住宅卡编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5155">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5156">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5156">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5157">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5157">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5158">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5158">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5159">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5159">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5160">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5160">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5161">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5161">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5162">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5162">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5163">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5163">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5164">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5164">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5165">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5165">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5166">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5166">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5167">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5167">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5168">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5168">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5170">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5170">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5171">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5171">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5172">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5172">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5173">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5173">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5174">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5174">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5175">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5175">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5176">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5176">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5177">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5177">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5178">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5178">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5179">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5179">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5181">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5181">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5182">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5182">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5184">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5184">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5186">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5186">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5187">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5187">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5188">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5188">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5189">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5189">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5190">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5190">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5191">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5192">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5192">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5193">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5194">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5194">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5195">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5195">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5196">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5196">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5197">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5197">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5198">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5198">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5199">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5199">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5200">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5200">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5201">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5201">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5202">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5202">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5203">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5203">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5204">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5204">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5205">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5205">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5206">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5206">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5207">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5207">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5208">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5208">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5209">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5209">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5210">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5210">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5211">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5211">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5212">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5212">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5213">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5213">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5214">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5214">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5215">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5215">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5216">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5216">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5217">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5217">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5218">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5219">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5219">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5220">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5220">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5221">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5221">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5222">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5222">Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5223">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5223">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5225">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5225">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5226">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5226">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5227">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5227">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5228">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5228">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5229">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5229">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5230">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5230">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5231">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5231">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5232">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5232">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5233">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5233">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5234">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5234">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5235">autovadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5235">autovadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5236">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5236">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5238">11个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5238">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5239">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5240">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5240">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5241">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5241">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5242">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5242">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5243">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5243">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5244">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5244">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5245">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5245">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5246">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5246">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5247">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5247">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5248">两位数 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5248">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5249">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5249">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5250">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5251">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5251">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5252">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5253">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5253">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5254">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5254">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5255">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5255">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5256">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5256">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5257">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5257">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5320">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5320">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5321">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5321">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5322">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5322">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5323">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5323">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5324">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5324">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5325">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5325">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5326">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5326">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5327">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5327">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5328">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5329">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5329">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5330">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5331">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5331">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5332">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5332">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5333">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5333">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
