## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5353">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5353">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5354">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5354">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5355">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5355">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5356">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5356">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5357">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5357">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5358">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5358">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5359">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5360">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5361">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5362">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5363">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5363">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5364">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5364">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5379">vairuotojo pažymėjimas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5379">vairuotojo pažymėjimas</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5380">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5380">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5381">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5381">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5382">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5382">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5383">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5383">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5384">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5384">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5385">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5385">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5386">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5386">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5388">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5388">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5390">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5390">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5391">一种数字 (1-6) ，对应于个人的性别和出生世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5391">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5392">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5392">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5393">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5393">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5394">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5394">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5395">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5395">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5396">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5396">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5397">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5397">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5398">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5398">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5399">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5399">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5400">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5400">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5401">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5401">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5402">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5402">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5437">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5437">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5438">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5438">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5439">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5439">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5440">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5440">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5441">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5441">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5442">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5442">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5443">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5444">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5444">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5445">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5446">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5446">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5447">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5447">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5448">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5448">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5465">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5465">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5466">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5466">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5467">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5467">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5468">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5468">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5469">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5469">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5470">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5470">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5471">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5471">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5472">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5472">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5473">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5473">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5474">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5474">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5475">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5475">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5476">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5476">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5477">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5477">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5481">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5481">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5482">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5482">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5483">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5483">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5484">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5484">drivers license</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5492">Luxemburg (自然个人的国家标识号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5492">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5493">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5493">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5494">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5494">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5495">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5495">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5496">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5496">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5497">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5497">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5498">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5498">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5499">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5499">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5500">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5500">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5501">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5501">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5502">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5502">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5503">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5503">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5504">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5504">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5505">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5506">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5506">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5507">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5508">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5508">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5509">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5509">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5510">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5510">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5511">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5511">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5512">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5512">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5535">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5535">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5536">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5536">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5537">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5538">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5538">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5539">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5540">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5540">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5541">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5541">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5542">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5542">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5543">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5543">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5544">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5544">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5545">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5545">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5546">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5546">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5547">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5547">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5548">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5548">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5553">Luxemburg 国内标识号 (非自然个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5553">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5554">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5555">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5555">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5556">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5557">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5557">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5558">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5558">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5559">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5559">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5560">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5560">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5561">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5561">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5562">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5562">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5563">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5563">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5564">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5564">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5565">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5565">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5566">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5567">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5567">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5568">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5569">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5569">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5570">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5570">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5571">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5571">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5572">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5573">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5573">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5613">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5613">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5614">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5614">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5615">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5615">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5616">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5616">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5617">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5617">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5618">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5618">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5619">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5619">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5620">两个字母的出生位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5620">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5621">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5621">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5622">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5622">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5623">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5623">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5624">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5625">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5626">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5627">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5627">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5628">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5628">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5629">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5629">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5653">马来西亚身份卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5653">malaysian identity card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5656">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5656">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5657">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5657">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5659">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5659">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5660">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5661">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5661">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5662">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5662">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5663">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5663">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5664">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5664">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5665">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5665">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5666">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5666">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5667">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5668">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5668">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5669">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5670">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5671">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5671">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5672">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5672">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5678">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5678">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5684">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5684">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5685">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5685">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5688">马耳他身份卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5688">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5689">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5690">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5691">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5692">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5693">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5694">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5696">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5696">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5698">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5698">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5699">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5699">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5700">在 "M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z" (不区分大小写中的一个字母) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5700">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5701">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5702">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5702">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5703">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5704">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5704">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5705">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5706">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5706">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5707">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5707">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5708">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5708">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5709">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5709">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5725">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5725">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5726">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5726">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5727">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5728">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5728">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5729">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5730">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5730">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5731">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5732">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5732">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5733">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5734">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5735">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5735">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5736">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5736">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5753">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5753">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5754">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5754">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5755">对于马耳他 nationals：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5755">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5756">七个数字和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5756">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5757">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5757">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5758">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5758">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5759">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5760">马耳他 nationals：七位数和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5760">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5761">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5761">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5762">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5762">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5763">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5763">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5764">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5764">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5765">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5766">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5766">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5767">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5768">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5768">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5769">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5769">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5770">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5770">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5771">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5771">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5772">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5772">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5805">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5805">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5807">8-9 个数字，包含可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5807">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5809">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5809">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5810">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5810">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5811">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5811">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5812">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5812">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5813">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5813">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5814">双三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5814">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5815">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5816">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5817">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5818">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5819">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5819">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5820">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5820">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5821">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5821">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5845">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5845">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5846">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5846">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5847">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5847">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5848">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5848">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5849">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5849">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5850">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5850">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5851">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5852">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5852">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5853">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5854">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5854">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5855">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5855">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5856">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5856">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5874">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5874">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5875">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5875">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5876">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5876">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5877">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5877">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5878">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5878">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5879">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5879">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5880">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5880">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5881">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5881">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5882">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5882">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5883">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5883">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5884">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5884">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5885">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5885">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5895">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5895">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5896">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5896">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5897">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5897">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5898">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5898">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5899">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5899">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5900">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5900">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5901">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5901">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5903">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5903">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5904">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5904">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5905">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5905">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5906">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5906">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5907">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5907">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5908">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5908">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5909">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5909">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5910">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5910">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5911">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5911">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5912">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5912">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5913">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5913">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5951">荷兰增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5951">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5952">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5952">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5953">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5953">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5954">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5954">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5955">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5955">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5956">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5956">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5957">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5957">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5958">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5958">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5959">14个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5959">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5960">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5960">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5961">14个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5961">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5962">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5962">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5963">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5963">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5964">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5964">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5965">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5965">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5966">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5966">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5967">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5967">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5968">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5968">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5969">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5969">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5970">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5970">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5971">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5971">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5972">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5972">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5973">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5973">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5974">找到 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5974">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5975">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5975">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5976">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5976">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5978">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5978">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5985">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5985">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-5986">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5986">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5987">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5987">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5988">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5988">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5989">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5989">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5990">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5990">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5991">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5991">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5992">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5992">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5993">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5993">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-5994">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5994">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-5995">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5995">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5996">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5996">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5997">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5997">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5998">三到四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5998">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-5999">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-5999">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6000">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6000">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6001">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6001">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6002">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6002">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6003">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6003">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6004">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6004">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6005">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6005">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6006">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6006">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6007">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6007">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6008">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6008">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6009">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6009">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6010">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6010">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6011">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6011">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6019">新西兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6019">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6020">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6020">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6021">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6021">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6022">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6022">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6023">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6023">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6024">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6024">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6025">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6025">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6026">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6026">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6027">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6027">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6028">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6028">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6029">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6029">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6030">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6030">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6031">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6031">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6032">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6032">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6033">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6033">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6034">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6034">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6035">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6035">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6036">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6036">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6037">找到 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6037">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6038">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6038">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6039">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6039">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6106">新西兰 inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6106">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6107">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6107">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6108">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6108">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6109">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6109">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6110">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6110">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6111">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6111">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6112">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6112">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6113">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6113">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6114">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6114">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6115">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6115">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6116">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6116">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6117">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6117">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6118">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6118">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6119">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6119">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6120">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6120">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6121">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6121">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6122">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6123">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6124">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6125">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6126">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6126">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6127">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6127">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6128">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6128">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6129">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6129">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6130">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6130">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6131">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6131">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6132">ird。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6132">ird no.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6135">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6135">new zealand ird</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6138">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6138">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6139">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6139">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6140">三个字母、一个空格 (可选) 和四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6140">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6141">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6141">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6142">三个字母 (不区分大小写)  (可选的空格) 四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6142">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6143">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6144">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6144">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6145">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6146">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6146">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6147">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6147">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6148">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6148">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6149">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6149">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6150">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6150">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6152">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6152">NHI</span></span>
