## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6156">新西兰社会 wlefare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6156">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6157">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6157">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6158">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6158">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6159">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6159">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6160">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6160">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6161">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6161">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6162">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6162">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6163">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6163">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6164">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6164">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6165">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6165">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6166">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6166">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6167">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6167">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6168">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6168">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6169">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6169">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6170">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6170">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6171">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6171">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6173">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6173">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6175">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6176">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6176">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6177">找到 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6177">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6178">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6178">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6179">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6179">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6180">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6180">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6181">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6181">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6182">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6182">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6183">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6183">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6184">社会 welfare 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6184">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6185">社会 welfare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6185">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6186">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6186">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6187">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6187">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6188">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6189">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6189">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6190">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6191">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6191">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6192">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6192">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6193">三位数的个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6193">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6194">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6194">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6195">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6196">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6196">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6197">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6198">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6199">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6199">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6200">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6200">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6201">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6201">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6202">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6202">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6203">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6203">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6204">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6204">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6206">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6206">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6213">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6213">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6214">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6215">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6215">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6216">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6217">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6217">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6218">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6218">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6219">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6219">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6220">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6220">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6221">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6221">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6222">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6222">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6223">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6224">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6224">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6225">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6226">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6226">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6227">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6227">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6228">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6228">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6229">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6229">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6230">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6230">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6231">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6231">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6232">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6232">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6233">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6233">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6234">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6234">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6235">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6235">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6236">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6236">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6237">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6237">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6238">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6238">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6239">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6239">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6240">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6240">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6241">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6241">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6242">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6242">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6243">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6243">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6244">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6244">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6245">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6245">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6246">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6247">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6248">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6250">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6250">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6251">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6251">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6252">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6252">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6253">Keywords_poland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6253">Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6254">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6254">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6255">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6255">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6256">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6256">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6257">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6257">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6258">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6258">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6259">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6259">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6260">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6260">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6261">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6261">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6262">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6262">driver's license number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6267">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6267">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6269">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6269">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6270">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6271">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6271">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6272">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6273">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6273">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6274">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6275">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6276">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6276">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6277">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6277">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6278">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6278">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6284">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6284">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6285">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6285">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6286">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6286">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6287">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6287">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-6288">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6288">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6289">波兰国 ID (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6289">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6290">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6291">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6291">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6292">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6292">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6293">表示出生日期的6个数字 YYMMDD 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6293">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6294">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6294">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6295">1校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6295">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6296">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6297">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6297">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6298">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6299">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6300">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6300">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6301">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6301">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6302">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6302">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6303">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6303">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6304">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6304">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6305">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6305">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6307">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6307">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6317">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6317">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6318">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6318">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6319">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6319">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6320">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6320">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6321">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6321">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6322">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6322">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6323">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6324">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6325">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6326">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6327">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6327">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6328">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6328">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6329">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6329">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6330">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6330">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6331">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6331">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6336">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6336">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6337">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6337">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6338">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6338">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6339">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6339">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6340">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6340">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6341">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6341">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6342">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6342">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6343">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6343">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6344">9个数字或14个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6344">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6345">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6345">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6346">9个数字或14位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6346">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6347">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6347">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6348">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6348">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6349">号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6349">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6350">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6350">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6351">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6351">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6352">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6352">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6353">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6353">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6354">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6354">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6355">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6355">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6356">找到 Keywords_polish_regon_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6356">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6357">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6357">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6358">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6358">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6359">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6359">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6360">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6360">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6361">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6361">regon id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6362">统计数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6362">statistical number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6363">统计 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6363">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6364">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6364">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6365">regon 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6365">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6366">regonid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6366">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6367">regonno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6367">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6368">公司 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6368">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6369">companyid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6369">companyid#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6375">波兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6375">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6376">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6376">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6377">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6377">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6378">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6378">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6379">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6379">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6380">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6380">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6381">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6381">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6382">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6382">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6383">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6383">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6384">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6384">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6385">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6385">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6386">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6386">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6387">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6387">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6388">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6388">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6389">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6389">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6390">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6390">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6391">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6391">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6421">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6421">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6422">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6422">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6423">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6423">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6424">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6424">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6425">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6425">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6426">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6426">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6427">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6427">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6428">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6428">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6429">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6429">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6430">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6430">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6431">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6431">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6451">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6451">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6452">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6452">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6453">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6453">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6454">两个字母后跟指定模式中的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6454">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6455">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6455">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6456">两个字母后跟七个包含特殊字符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6456">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6457">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6457">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6458">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6458">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6459">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6459">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6460">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6460">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6461">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6461">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6462">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6462">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6463">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6463">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6464">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6464">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6465">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6465">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6466">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6466">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6467">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6467">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6483">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6483">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6484">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6484">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6486">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6486">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6487">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6488">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6488">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6489">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6489">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6490">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6490">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6491">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6492">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6492">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6493">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6494">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6494">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6495">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6495">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6496">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6496">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6520">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6520">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6521">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6521">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6522">9个带可选空格的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6522">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6523">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6523">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6524">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6524">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6525">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6525">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6526">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6526">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6527">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6527">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6528">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6528">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6530">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6530">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6532">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6532">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6533">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6533">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6534">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6534">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6535">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6535">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6536">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6536">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6561">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6561">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6562">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6562">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6563">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6563">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6564">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6564">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6565">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6565">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6566">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6566">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6567">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6567">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6568">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6568">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6569">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6570">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6570">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6571">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6572">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6572">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6573">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6573">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6574">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6574">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6590">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6590">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6591">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6591">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6592">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6592">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6593">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6593">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6594">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6594">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6595">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6595">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6596">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6596">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6597">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6598">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6598">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6599">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6600">1-9 的1位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6600">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6601">代表出生日期 (YYMMDD 的6个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6601">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6602">2位数，可以为01-52 或99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6602">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6603">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6603">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6604">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6604">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6605">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6605">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6606">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6606">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6607">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6607">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6608">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6608">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6609">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6609">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6610">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6610">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6611">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6611">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6662">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6662">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6663">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6663">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6665">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6665">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6666">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6667">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6667">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6668">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6669">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6669">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6670">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6671">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6672">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6672">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6673">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6673">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6687">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6687">numărul pașaportului numarul pasaportului numerele pașaportului Pașaport nr</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6688">俄罗斯护照号码（国内）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6688">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6689">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6689">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6690">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6690">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6691">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6691">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6692">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6692">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6693">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6693">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6694">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6694">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6696">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6696">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6698">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6698">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6699">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6699">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6700">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6700">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6701">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6701">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6702">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6702">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6703">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6703">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6704">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6705">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6705">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6706">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6707">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6707">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6708">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6708">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6709">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6709">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6710">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6710">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_russia_passport_number_domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6711">Keyword_russia_passport_number_domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6711">Keyword_russia_passport_number_domestic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6712">护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6712">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6713">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6713">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6726">俄罗斯护照号码（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6726">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6727">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6727">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6728">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6728">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6729">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6729">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6730">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6730">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6731">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6731">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6732">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6732">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6733">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6733">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6734">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6734">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6735">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6735">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6736">9位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6736">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6737">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6737">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6738">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6738">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6739">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6739">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6740">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6741">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6741">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6742">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6743">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6744">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6744">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6745">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6745">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6762">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6762">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6763">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6763">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6764">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6764">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6765">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6765">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6766">10个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6766">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6767">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6767">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6768">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6768">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6769">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6769">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6770">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6770">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6771">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6771">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6772">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6772">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6778">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6778">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6779">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6779">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6781">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6781">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6782">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6783">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6783">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6784">字母 "F"、"G"、"S" 或 "T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6784">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6785">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6785">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6786">字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6786">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6787">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6788">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6789">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6790">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6791">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6791">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6792">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6792">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6793">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6794">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6795">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6795">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6796">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6807">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6807">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6808">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6808">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6809">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6809">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6810">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6810">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6811">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6811">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6812">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6812">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6813">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6813">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6814">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6814">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6815">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6816">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6816">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6817">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6818">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6818">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6819">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6819">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6820">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6820">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6821">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6821">Keywords</span></span>
