## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6836">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6836">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6837">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6837">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6838">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6838">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6839">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6839">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6840">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6840">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6841">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6841">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6842">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6842">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6843">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6843">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6844">九或十个数字，包含可选反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6844">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6845">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6845">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6846">代表出生日期的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6846">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6847">可选的斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6847">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6848">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6848">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6849">1可选校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6849">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6850">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6851">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6851">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6852">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6853">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6853">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6854">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6854">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6855">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6855">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6856">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6856">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6857">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6857">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6904">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6904">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6905">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6906">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6907">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6907">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6908">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6909">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6909">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6910">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6910">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6911">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6911">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6912">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6912">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6913">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6913">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6914">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6914">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6915">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6915">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6934">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6934">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6935">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6935">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6936">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6936">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6937">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6937">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6938">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6938">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6939">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6939">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6940">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6940">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6941">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6941">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6942">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6942">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6943">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6943">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6944">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6944">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6945">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6945">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6961">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6961">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6962">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6962">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6963">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6963">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6964">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6964">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6965">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6965">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6966">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6966">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6967">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6967">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6968">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6969">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6969">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6970">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6971">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6971">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6972">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6972">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6973">两个数字，对应于出生区域 "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6973">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6974">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6974">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6975">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6975">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6976">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6977">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6977">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-6978">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-6979">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6980">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6980">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6981">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6981">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-6982">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-6983">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-6983">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7011">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7011">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7012">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7012">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7014">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7014">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7015">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7016">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7016">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7017">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7017">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7018">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7018">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7019">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7019">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7020">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7020">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7021">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7021">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7022">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7022">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7023">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7023">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7024">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7024">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7025">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7025">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7045">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7045">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7046">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7046">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7047">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7047">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7048">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7048">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7049">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7049">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7050">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7050">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7051">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7051">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7052">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7053">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7053">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7054">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7054">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7055">一个从1-9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7055">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7056">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7056">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7057">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7057">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7058">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7059">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7059">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7060">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7061">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7061">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7062">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7062">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7063">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7063">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7064">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7064">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7065">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7065">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7089">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7089">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7090">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7090">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7091">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7091">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7092">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7092">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7093">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7093">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7094">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7094">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7095">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7095">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7096">一位公民指示器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7096">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7097">数字 "8" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7097">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7098">一个数字，是校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7098">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7099">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7099">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7100">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7100">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7101">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7101">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7102">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7102">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7103">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7103">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7104">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7104">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7105">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7105">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7106">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7106">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7107">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7107">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7109">ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7109">ID</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7111">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7111">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7112">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7112">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7113">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7113">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7114">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7114">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7115">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7115">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7116">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7116">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7117">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7117">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7118">由世纪和性别确定的一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7118">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7119">四位数的出生区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7119">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7120">一种用于区分上述号码相同的人员的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7120">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7121">校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7121">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7122">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7123">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7123">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7124">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7125">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7125">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7126">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7126">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7127">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7127">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7128">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7128">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7129">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7129">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7130">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7130">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7131">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7132">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7132">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7133">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7133">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7134">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7134">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7135">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7135">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7136">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7136">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7137">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7137">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7138">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7138">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7139">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7139">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7140">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7140">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7141">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7142">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7142">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7143">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7144">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7144">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7145">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7145">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7146">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7146">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7147">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7148">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7148">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7149">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7150">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7150">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7151">函数  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7151">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7152">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7152">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7189">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7189">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7190">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7190">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7191">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7191">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7192">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7192">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7193">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7193">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7194">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7194">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7195">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7195">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7196">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7196">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7197">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7197">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7198">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7198">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7199">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7199">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7200">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7200">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7201">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7201">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7202">一个检查信函 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7202">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7203">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7203">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7204">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7204">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7205">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7205">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7206">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7206">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7207">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7207">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7208">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7208">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7209">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7210">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7210">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7234">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7234">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7235">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7235">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7236">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7236">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7237">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7237">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7238">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7238">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7239">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7239">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7240">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7240">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7241">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7241">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7242">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7242">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7243">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7243">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7244">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7244">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7245">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7245">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7246">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7246">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7247">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7247">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7248">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7248">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7271">pasaporte。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7271">pasaporte no.</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7274"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7274">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7275">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7275">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7276">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7277">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7277">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7278">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7279">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7279">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7280">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7280">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7281">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7281">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7282">七到八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7282">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7283">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7283">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7284">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7284">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7285">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7286">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7287">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7288">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7289">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7289">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7290">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7290">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7291">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7291">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7292">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7292">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7293">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7293">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7294">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7294">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7295">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7295">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7296">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7296">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7297">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7297">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7298">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7298">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7299">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7299">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7300">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7300">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7301">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7301">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7302">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7302">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7303">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7303">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7304">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7304">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7305">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7305">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7306">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7306">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7307">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7307">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7308">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7308">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7309">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7309">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7310">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7310">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7311">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7311">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7312">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7312">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7313">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7313">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7314">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7314">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7315">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7315">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7316">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7316">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7317">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7317">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7318">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7318">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7319">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7319">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7320">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7321">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7321">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7322">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7323">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7323">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7324">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7325">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7325">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7326">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7326">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7327">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7327">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7328">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7328">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7329">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7329">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7360">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7360">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7361">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7361">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7362">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7362">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7363">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7363">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7364">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7364">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7365">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7365">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7366">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7366">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7367">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7367">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7368">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7368">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7369">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7369">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7370">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7370">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7371">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7372">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7373">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7374">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7374">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7375">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7375">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7376">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7376">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7377">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7377">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7378">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7378">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7388">密码或密码后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7388">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7389">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7389">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7390">小于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7390">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7391">1-200 个字符的任意组合，这些字符为大写或小写字母、数字、星号 ( \* ) 、连字符 ( ) 、下划线 (_) 或空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7391">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7406">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7406">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7407">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7407">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7409">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7409">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7410">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7410">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7411">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7411">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7412">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7412">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7413">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7413">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7414">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7414">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7416">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7416">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7418">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7419">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7419">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7420">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7420">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7422">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7422">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7426">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7426">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7427">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7427">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7428">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7428">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7433">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7433">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7436">瑞典国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7436">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7437">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7438">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7438">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7439">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7440">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7440">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7441">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7441">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7442">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7442">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7443">"-" 或 "+" 的分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7443">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7444">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7444">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7445">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7446">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7446">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7447">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7448">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7448">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7449">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7449">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7450">找到了 from 关键字 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7450">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7451">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7451">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7452">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7452">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7453">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7453">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7454">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7454">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7473">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7473">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7474">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7474">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7476">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7476">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7478">八个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7478">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7480">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7480">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7482">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7483">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7483">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7484">满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7484">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7485">找到 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7485">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7486">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7486">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7517">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7517">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7518">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7518">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7519">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7519">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7520">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7520">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7521">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7521">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7522">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7522">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7523">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7523">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7524">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7524">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7525">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7525">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7526">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7526">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7527">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7527">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7528">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7528">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7529">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7529">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7530">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7530">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7531">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7531">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7532">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7532">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7533">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7533">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7534">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7534">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7535">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7535">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7551">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7551">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7552">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7552">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7553">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7553">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7554">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7554">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7555">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7555">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7556">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7556">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7557">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7557">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7558">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7559">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7559">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7560">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7561">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7561">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7562">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7562">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7563">正号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7563">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7564">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7564">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7565">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7565">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7566">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7566">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7567">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7567">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7568">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7569">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7570">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7571">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7572">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7572">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7573">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7573">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7574">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7575">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7575">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7586">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7586">tax identification no</span></span>
