## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7601">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7601">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7602">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7603">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7603">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7604">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7605">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7605">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7606">四个字母的银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7606">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7607">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7607">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7608">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7608">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7609">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7609">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7610">BBAN 的余数 (1 到3个字母或数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7610">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7611">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7611">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7612">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7612">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7613">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7613">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7614">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7614">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7615">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7615">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7616">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7616">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7650">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7650">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7651">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7651">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7652">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7652">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7653">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7653">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7654">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7654">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7655">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7655">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7656">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7656">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7657">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7658">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7658">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7659">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7660">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7660">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7661">三位数-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7661">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7662">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7662">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7663">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7663">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7664">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7664">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7665">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7665">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7666">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7666">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7667">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7667">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7668">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7669">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7669">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7670">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7671">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7671">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7672">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7672">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7673">找到 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7673">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7674">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7675">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7675">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7696">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7696">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7697">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7698">一个英文)  (，后跟9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7698">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7699">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7700">一个英文字母 (，后跟9个数字) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7700">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7701">一个英文字母 (，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7701">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7702">数字 "1" 或 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7702">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7703">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7703">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7704">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7705">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7705">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7706">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7707">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7707">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7708">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7708">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7709">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7709">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7710">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7710">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7711">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7712">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7712">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7713">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7713">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7722">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7722">身分證號碼</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7730">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7730">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7731">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7731">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7732">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7732">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7733">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7733">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7734">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7734">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7735">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7735">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7736">字符 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7736">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7737">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7737">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7738">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7738">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7739">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7739">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7740">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7741">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7741">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7742">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7743">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7743">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7744">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7744">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7745">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7745">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7746">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7746">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7747">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7747">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7748">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7748">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7749">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7749">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7750">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7750">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7751">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7751">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7752">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7752">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7753">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7753">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7754">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7754">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7755">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7755">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7756">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7756">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7757">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7758">10个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7758">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7759">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7760">10个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7760">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7761">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7761">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7762">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7762">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7763">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7764">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7764">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7765">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7766">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7766">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7767">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7767">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7768">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7768">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7769">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7769">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7770">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7770">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7771">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7771">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7772">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7772">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7773">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7773">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7774">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7774">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7775">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7775">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7776">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7776">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7777">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7777">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7778">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7778">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7779">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7779">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7780">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7780">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7781">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7781">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7782">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7782">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7783">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7783">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7784">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7784">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7785">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7785">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7786">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7786">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7787">第一个数字不是零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7787">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7788">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7788">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7790">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7790">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7793">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7793">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7794">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7794">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7795">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7795">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7796">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7796">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7797">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7797">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7798">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7798">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7799">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7799">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7800">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7800">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7801">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7801">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7802">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7802">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7803">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7803">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7804">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7804">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7805">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7805">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7807">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7807">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7809">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7809">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7811">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7811">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7813">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7814">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7814">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7815">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7815">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7816">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7816">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7817">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7817">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7824">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7824">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-7825">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7825">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7826">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7826">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7827">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7827">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7828">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7828">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7829">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7829">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7830">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7830">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7831">5个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7831">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7832">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7832">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7833">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7833">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7834">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7834">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7835">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7835">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7836">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7837">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7838">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7839">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7839">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7840">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7840">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7841">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7841">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7842">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7860">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7860">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-7861">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7861">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7863">两个字母后跟1-4 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7863">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7864">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7865">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后接1-4 个号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7865">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7866">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7867">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7867">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7868">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7869">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7869">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7870">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7870">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7871">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7871">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7878">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7878">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-7879">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7879">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7881">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7881">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7882">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7883">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7883">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7884">3个或10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7884">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7885">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7885">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7886">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7886">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7887">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7887">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7888">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7888">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7889">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7890">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7890">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7891">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7892">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7892">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7893">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7893">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7894">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7894">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7895">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7895">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7896">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7896">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-7897">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7897">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7898">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7898">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7900">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7900">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7910">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7910">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7911">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7911">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7912">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7912">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7913">D. B。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7913">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7914">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7914">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7915">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7915">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7916">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7916">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-7917">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7917">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7918">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7918">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7919">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7919">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7920">由空格或短划线分隔的七个字符或九个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7920">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7921">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7921">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7922">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7922">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7923"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7923">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7924">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7924">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7925">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7925">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7926">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7926">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7927">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7927">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7928">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7928">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7929">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7929">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7930">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7930">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7931">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7931">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7932">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7932">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7933">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7933">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7934">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7934">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7935">要么是 "A"、"B"、"C"，要么 ' d '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7935">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7936">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7937">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7938">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7939">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7940">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7940">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7941">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7941">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7942">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7942">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7943">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7943">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7944">未找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7944">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7966">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7966">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-7967">唯一的纳税人参考号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7967">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-7968">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7968">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7969">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7969">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7970">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7970">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7971">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7971">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7972">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7972">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7973">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7973">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7974">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7974">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7975">10个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7975">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7976">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7976">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7977">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7977">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7978">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7979">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7979">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-7980">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-7981">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7981">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7982">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7982">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-7983">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-7983">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8003">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8003">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8004">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8004">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8005">8-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8005">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8006">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8007">8-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8007">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8008">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8008">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8009">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8009">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8010">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8010">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8011">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8011">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8012">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8012">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8013">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8013">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8043">美国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8043">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8044">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8044">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8045">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8045">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8046">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8046">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8047">取决于状态-例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8047">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8048">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8048">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8049">9个数字（如 ddddddddd）将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8049">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8050">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8050">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8051">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8051">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8052">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8052">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8053">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8054">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8054">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8055">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8055">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8056">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8056">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8057">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8057">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8058">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8058">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8059">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8059">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8060">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8060">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8061">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8061">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8159">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8159">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8160">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8160">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8161">九个数字，以 "9" 开头，并包含 "7" 或 "8" 作为第四个数字，可以选择使用空格或短划线进行格式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8161">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8162">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8162">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8163">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8163">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8164">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8164">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8165">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8165">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8166">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8166">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8167">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8167">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8168">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8168">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8169">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8169">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8170">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8170">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8171">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8171">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8172">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8172">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8173">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8173">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8174">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8174">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8175">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8175">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8176">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8176">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8177">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8177">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8178">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8178">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8179">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8179">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8180">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8180">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8181">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8181">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-8182">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8182">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-8183">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8183">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-8184">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8184">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-8185">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8185">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8186">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8187">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8187">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8188">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8188">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-8189">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8189">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-8190">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8190">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="69820-8191">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8191">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8212"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8212">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8213">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8213">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8214">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8214">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="69820-8215">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8215">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8216">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8217">四个函数在四种不同的模式中查找 Ssn：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8217">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8218">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8218">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8219">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8220">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8221">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8222">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8223">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8223">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8224">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8225">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8226">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8226">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8227">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8227">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8228">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8229">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8229">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8230">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8230">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8231">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8231">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8232">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8232">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8233">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8233">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8234">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8234">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8235">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8235">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8236">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8236">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8238">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8238">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8251">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8251">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-8252">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8252">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-8253">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8253">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="69820-8254">护照号敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8254">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8255">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8256">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8256">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8257">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8258">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8258">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8259">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8259">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8260">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8260">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8261">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8261">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8262">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8262">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8263">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8263">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8264">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8264">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8265">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8265">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8266">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8266">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8267">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8267">Passport Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8268">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8268">Passport No</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8269">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8269">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8270">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8270">Passport#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8271">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8271">PassportID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8272">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8272">Passportno</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8273">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8273">passportnumber</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8274">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8274">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8275">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8275">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8276">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8276">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8277">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8277">パスポート＃</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8285">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8285">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-8286">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8286">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8287">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8287">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8288">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8288">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8289">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8289">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8290">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8290">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8291">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8291">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8292">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8292">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8293">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8293">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8294">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8294">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8295">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8295">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8296">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8297">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8297">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8298">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8299">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8299">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8300">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8300">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8301">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8301">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8310">乌克兰护照（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8310">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="69820-8311">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8311">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8312">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8312">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8313">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8313">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8314">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8314">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8315">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8315">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8316">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8316">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8317">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8317">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8318">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8318">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8319">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8319">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8320">八个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8320">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8321">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8321">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8322">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8322">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8323">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8324">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8324">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="69820-8325">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="69820-8326">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8326">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8327">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8327">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="69820-8328">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="69820-8328">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
